AbolishApi.title: AbolishApi
AbolishApi.summary: Unpublishes a specified API from a specified runtime environment.

AddAccessControlListEntry.title: AddAccessControlListEntry
AddAccessControlListEntry.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control capabilities for dedicated instances. Adds an IP address entry to the access control polocy of an instance.

AddIpControlPolicyItem.title: AddIpControlPolicyItem
AddIpControlPolicyItem.summary: Adds a policy to an existing ACL.

AddTrafficSpecialControl.title: AddTrafficSpecialControl
AddTrafficSpecialControl.summary: Adds a custom special policy to a specified throttling policy.

AttachPlugin.title: AttachPlugin
AttachPlugin.summary: Binds a plug-in to an API.

BatchAbolishApis.title: BatchAbolishApis
BatchAbolishApis.summary: Unpublishes multiple APIs at a time.

BatchDeployApis.title: BatchDeployApis
BatchDeployApis.summary: Publishes multiple APIs at a time.

CreateAccessControlList.title: CreateAccessControlList
CreateAccessControlList.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control capabilities for dedicated instances. Creates an Access Control List (ACL). Each user is allowed to create five ACLs in each region.

CreateApiStageVariable.title: CreateApiStageVariable
CreateApiStageVariable.summary: Adds a variable to an environment.

CreateApp.title: CreateApp
CreateApp.summary: Creates an application for calling APIs in API Gateway.

CreateBackend.title: CreateBackend
CreateBackend.summary: Creates a backend service in API Gateway.

CreateBackendModel.title: CreateBackendModel
CreateBackendModel.summary: Creates a backend service configuration in an environment.

CreateDatasetItem.title: CreateDatasetItem
CreateDatasetItem.summary: Creates a data entry in a custom dataset.

CreateIpControl.title: CreateIpControl
CreateIpControl.summary: Creates an access control list (ACL) in a region.

CreateLogConfig.title: CreateLogConfig
CreateLogConfig.summary: Creates a Simple Log Service configuration for an API.

CreateModel.title: CreateModel
CreateModel.summary: Creates a model for an API group.

CreateMonitorGroup.title: CreateMonitorGroup
CreateMonitorGroup.summary: Enables CloudMonitor alerting for an API group.

DeleteAccessControlList.title: DeleteAccessControlList
DeleteAccessControlList.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control capabilities for dedicated instances. Deletes an access control policy.

DeleteAllTrafficSpecialControl.title: DeleteAllTrafficSpecialControl
DeleteAllTrafficSpecialControl.summary: Deletes all custom special policies of a specified throttling policy.

DeleteApiStageVariable.title: DeleteApiStageVariable
DeleteApiStageVariable.summary: Deletes a specified variable in a specified environment.

DeleteBackendModel.title: DeleteBackendModel
DeleteBackendModel.summary: Deletes the definition of a backend service in an environment. After the definition is deleted, the API that uses the backend service and is published to this environment will be unpublished.

DeleteDatasetItem.title: DeleteDatasetItem
DeleteDatasetItem.summary: Deletes a data entry from a custom dataset.

DeleteDomain.title: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.summary: Unbinds a custom domain name from a specified API group.

DeleteDomainCertificate.title: DeleteDomainCertificate
DeleteDomainCertificate.summary: Deletes the SSL certificate of a domain name. This operation is intended for API providers. If the SSL certificate does not exist, a success response is still returned. If the specified API group does not exist, the InvalidGroupId.NotFound error is returned. Access over HTTPS is not supported after the SSL certificate is deleted. Exercise caution when using this API operation.

DeleteModel.title: DeleteModel
DeleteModel.summary: Deletes a model from Model Management for an API group.

DeleteMonitorGroup.title: DeleteMonitorGroup
DeleteMonitorGroup.summary: Deletes a CloudMonitor application group corresponding to an API group.

DeleteTrafficControl.title: DeleteTrafficControl
DeleteTrafficControl.summary: Deletes a custom throttling policy and the special throttling rules in the policy.

DeleteTrafficSpecialControl.title: DeleteTrafficSpecialControl
DeleteTrafficSpecialControl.summary: Deletes a custom special throttling policy.

DeployApi.title: DeployApi
DeployApi.summary: Publishes an API to an environment.

DescribeAbolishApiTask.title: DescribeAbolishApiTask
DescribeAbolishApiTask.summary: Queries the progress of an API unpublishing task.

DescribeAccessControlListAttribute.title: DescribeAccessControlListAttribute
DescribeAccessControlListAttribute.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control for dedicated instances. Queries the details of an access control policy.

DescribeAccessControlLists.title: DescribeAccessControlLists
DescribeAccessControlLists.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control for dedicated instances. Queries access control policies.

DescribeApi.title: DescribeApi
DescribeApi.summary: Queries the definition of an API.

DescribeApiDoc.title: DescribeApiDoc
DescribeApiDoc.summary: Queries the documentation of an API.

DescribeApiGroup.title: DescribeApiGroup
DescribeApiGroup.summary: You can call this operation to query details about an API group, including the automatically assigned second-level domain name, custom domain name, and SSL certificate.

DescribeApiGroupVpcWhitelist.title: DescribeApiGroupVpcWhitelist
DescribeApiGroupVpcWhitelist.summary: Queries the VPCs that are allowed to access an API group.

DescribeApiGroups.title: DescribeApiGroups
DescribeApiGroups.summary: Queries existing API groups and their basic information.

DescribeApiHistories.title: DescribeApiHistories
DescribeApiHistories.summary: Queries the historical versions of a specified API.

DescribeApiHistory.title: DescribeApiHistory
DescribeApiHistory.summary: Queries the details of a specified historical version of a specified API definition.

DescribeApiIpControls.title: DescribeApiIpControls
DescribeApiIpControls.summary: Queries the access control lists (ACLs) that are bound to all the APIs in an API group in a specified environment.

DescribeApiLatencyData.title: DescribeApiLatencyData
DescribeApiLatencyData.summary: Queries the response time statistics of an API.

DescribeApiMarketAttributes.title: DescribeApiMarketAttributes
DescribeApiMarketAttributes.summary: Queries the Alibaba Cloud Marketplace attributes of an API.

DescribeApiQpsData.title: DescribeApiQpsData
DescribeApiQpsData.summary: Queries the QPS statistics of an API.

DescribeApiSignatures.title: DescribeApiSignatures
DescribeApiSignatures.summary: Queries the backend signature keys that are bound to the APIs of a specified API group in a specified environment.

DescribeApiTrafficControls.title: DescribeApiTrafficControls
DescribeApiTrafficControls.summary: Queries the throttling policies bound to all members of an API group in a specified environment.

DescribeApiTrafficData.title: DescribeApiTrafficData
DescribeApiTrafficData.summary: Queries the statistics on the traffic of an API.

DescribeApis.title: DescribeApis
DescribeApis.summary: Queries a list of APIs that are being defined.

DescribeApisByApp.title: DescribeApisByApp
DescribeApisByApp.summary: Queries the APIs with which an application is associated.

DescribeApisByBackend.title: DescribeApisByBackend
DescribeApisByBackend.summary: Queries APIs that use a backend service. The results include APIs in the draft state and published APIs.

DescribeApisByIpControl.title: DescribeApisByIpControl
DescribeApisByIpControl.summary: Queries the APIs that are bound to an access control list (ACL).

DescribeApisBySignature.title: DescribeApisBySignature
DescribeApisBySignature.summary: Queries the APIs to which a specified backend signature key is bound.

DescribeApisByTrafficControl.title: DescribeApisByTrafficControl
DescribeApisByTrafficControl.summary: Queries the APIs to which a specified throttling policy is bound.

DescribeApisWithStageNameIntegratedByApp.title: DescribeApisWithStageNameIntegratedByApp
DescribeApisWithStageNameIntegratedByApp.summary: Queries APIs by application. The environment information is also returned.

DescribeApp.title: DescribeApp
DescribeApp.summary: Queries the apps that can be authorized.

DescribeAppAttributes.title: DescribeAppAttributes
DescribeAppAttributes.summary: Queries apps and their basic information.

DescribeAppSecurity.title: DescribeAppSecurity
DescribeAppSecurity.summary: This key is used for authentication when an API call is made.

DescribeApps.title: DescribeApps
DescribeApps.summary: Queries the apps. App information is returned only to the app owner.

DescribeAuthorizedApis.title: DescribeAuthorizedApis
DescribeAuthorizedApis.summary: Queries the authorized APIs of a specified APP.

DescribeBackendInfo.title: DescribeBackendInfo
DescribeBackendInfo.summary: Queries the information about a backend service and its URL configured for each environment.

DescribeBackendList.title: DescribeBackendList
DescribeBackendList.summary: Queries backend services. You can filter backend services by backend service name and backend service type.

DescribeDatasetInfo.title: DescribeDatasetInfo
DescribeDatasetInfo.summary: Queries the information about a single dataset.

DescribeDatasetItemInfo.title: DescribeDatasetItemInfo
DescribeDatasetItemInfo.summary: Queries a data entry in a custom dataset.

DescribeDatasetItemList.title: DescribeDatasetItemList
DescribeDatasetItemList.summary: Queries the data entries of a custom dataset.

DescribeDeployApiTask.title: DescribeDeployApiTask
DescribeDeployApiTask.summary: Queries the progress of an asynchronous API publishing task.

DescribeDeployedApi.title: DescribeDeployedApi
DescribeDeployedApi.summary: Queries the definition of an API that takes effect in an environment. The definition may differ from the definition being edited.

DescribeDeployedApis.title: DescribeDeployedApis
DescribeDeployedApis.summary: Queries the APIs that are published to and running in an environment.

DescribeDomain.title: DescribeDomain
DescribeDomain.summary: Queries the details about a bound custom domain name, including the system assigned second-level domain name, custom domain name, and SSL certificate.

DescribeGroupQps.title: DescribeGroupQps
DescribeGroupQps.summary: Queries the statistics on the number of requests directed to an API group within a period of time.

DescribeHistoryApis.title: DescribeHistoryApis
DescribeHistoryApis.summary: Queries the historical versions of an API.

DescribeImportOASTask.title: DescribeImportOASTask
DescribeImportOASTask.summary: Queries the result of an OAS API import task.

DescribeInstanceDropConnections.title: DescribeInstanceDropConnections
DescribeInstanceDropConnections.summary: Queries the number of lost connections to a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceDropPacket.title: DescribeInstanceDropPacket
DescribeInstanceDropPacket.summary: Queries the number of dropped packets within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceHttpCode.title: DescribeInstanceHttpCode
DescribeInstanceHttpCode.summary: Queries the distribution of HTTP status codes of requests to a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceLatency.title: DescribeInstanceLatency
DescribeInstanceLatency.summary: Queries the average latency of a dedicated instance over a period of time.

DescribeInstanceNewConnections.title: DescribeInstanceNewConnections
DescribeInstanceNewConnections.summary: Queries the number of new connections to a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstancePackets.title: DescribeInstancePackets
DescribeInstancePackets.summary: Queries the numbers of inbound and outbound packets of a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceQps.title: DescribeInstanceQps
DescribeInstanceQps.summary: Queries the number of requests to a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceSlbConnect.title: DescribeInstanceSlbConnect
DescribeInstanceSlbConnect.summary: Queries the number of concurrent connections to a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstanceTraffic.title: DescribeInstanceTraffic
DescribeInstanceTraffic.summary: Queries the request traffic and response traffic of a dedicated instance within a period of time.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries the details of instances in a region. The instances include shared instances and dedicated instances.

DescribeIpControlPolicyItems.title: DescribeIpControlPolicyItems
DescribeIpControlPolicyItems.summary: Queries the rule entries of an IP address-based traffic control policy.

DescribeIpControls.title: DescribeIpControls
DescribeIpControls.summary: Queries custom access control lists (ACLs) on separate pages.

DescribeMarketRemainsQuota.title: DescribeMarketRemainsQuota
DescribeMarketRemainsQuota.summary: Queries the number of remaining order relationships for a purchaser.

DescribeModels.title: DescribeModels
DescribeModels.summary: Obtains the created models of an API group.

DescribePluginApis.title: DescribePluginApis
DescribePluginApis.summary: Queries the APIs to which a specified plug-in is bound.

DescribePluginSchemas.title: DescribePluginSchemas
DescribePluginSchemas.summary: Queries the plug-in schemas supported by API Gateway.

DescribePlugins.title: DescribePlugins
DescribePlugins.summary: Queries API Gateway plug-ins and the details of the plug-ins.

DescribePluginsByApi.title: DescribePluginsByApi
DescribePluginsByApi.summary: Queries the plug-ins that are bound to a running API in an environment.

DescribePurchasedApiGroup.title: DescribePurchasedApiGroup
DescribePurchasedApiGroup.summary: Queries the details about an API group purchased from Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.

DescribePurchasedApiGroups.title: DescribePurchasedApiGroups
DescribePurchasedApiGroups.summary: Queries API groups that are purchased from Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.

DescribePurchasedApis.title: DescribePurchasedApis
DescribePurchasedApis.summary: Queries APIs that are purchased from Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the Alibaba Cloud regions that are supported by API Gateway.

DescribeSignaturesByApi.title: DescribeSignaturesByApi
DescribeSignaturesByApi.summary: Queries the backend signature keys that are bound to a specified API.

DescribeSummaryData.title: DescribeSummaryData
DescribeSummaryData.summary: Queries the number of API Gateway resources in a region.

DescribeSystemParameters.title: DescribeSystemParameters
DescribeSystemParameters.summary: Queries the common parameters supported by the system.

DescribeTrafficControls.title: DescribeTrafficControls
DescribeTrafficControls.summary: Queries custom throttling policies and their details. Conditional queries are supported.

DescribeTrafficControlsByApi.title: DescribeTrafficControlsByApi
DescribeTrafficControlsByApi.summary: Queries the throttling policy that is bound to a specific API.

DescribeUpdateBackendTask.title: DescribeUpdateBackendTask
DescribeUpdateBackendTask.summary: When you modify the definition of a backend service in an environment, the associated published APIs are updated in batches. This API operation is used to query the update results.

DescribeUpdateVpcInfoTask.title: DescribeUpdateVpcInfoTask
DescribeUpdateVpcInfoTask.summary: Queries the update progress of an API that is being published after its associated VPC access authorization is updated.

DetachPlugin.title: DetachPlugin
DetachPlugin.summary: Unbinds a plug-in from an API.

DisableInstanceAccessControl.title: DisableInstanceAccessControl
DisableInstanceAccessControl.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control capabilities for dedicated API Gateway instances. Disables access control on an instance.

DryRunSwagger.title: DryRunSwagger
DryRunSwagger.summary: Checks the syntax by performing a dry run before Swagger-compliant data is imported.

EnableInstanceAccessControl.title: EnableInstanceAccessControl
EnableInstanceAccessControl.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control capabilities for dedicated API Gateway instances. Specifies the access control policy of an instance.

ImportOAS.title: ImportOAS
ImportOAS.summary: Imports APIs based on the OAS standard.

ImportSwagger.title: ImportSwagger
ImportSwagger.summary: Creates APIs by importing Swagger-compliant data.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources.

ModifyApi.title: ModifyApi
ModifyApi.summary: Modifies the definition of an API.

ModifyApiConfiguration.title: ModifyApiConfiguration
ModifyApiConfiguration.summary: Modifies the draft definition of an API. It is different from the ModifyApi operation in that it does not require all information about the API. You need to only specify the parameters that you want to modify. For example, if you want to change the authentication method of the API from Anonymous to APP, you specify APP as the value of AuthType and do not need to configure other parameters.

ModifyApiGroup.title: ModifyApiGroup
ModifyApiGroup.summary: Modifies the name, description, or basepath of an existing API group.

ModifyApiGroupVpcWhitelist.title: ModifyApiGroupVpcWhitelist
ModifyApiGroupVpcWhitelist.summary: Modifies the VPC whitelist of an API group.

ModifyBackend.title: ModifyBackend
ModifyBackend.summary: Modifies the basic information of a backend service, such as name and description. The backend service type cannot be modified once the backend service is created.

ModifyBackendModel.title: ModifyBackendModel
ModifyBackendModel.summary: Modifies the definition of a backend service in the environment. After the modification, the backend paths of the APIs that use the backend service in the same environment will be updated at the same time automatically. You do not need to manually publish the APIs again.

ModifyDataset.title: ModifyDataset
ModifyDataset.summary: Modifies the name of a custom dataset.

ModifyDatasetItem.title: ModifyDatasetItem
ModifyDatasetItem.summary: Modifies the timeout period and description of a data entry in a custom dataset.

ModifyInstanceSpec.title: ModifyInstanceSpec
ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: Upgrades or downgrades the configurations of an API Gateway instance.

ModifyIntranetDomainPolicy.title: ModifyIntranetDomainPolicy
ModifyIntranetDomainPolicy.summary: Modifies the VPC domain name policy of an API group.

ModifyIpControlPolicyItem.title: ModifyIpControlPolicyItem
ModifyIpControlPolicyItem.summary: Modifies a policy in an access control list (ACL).

ModifyModel.title: ModifyModel
ModifyModel.summary: Updates the model of an API group.

ModifyTrafficControl.title: ModifyTrafficControl
ModifyTrafficControl.summary: Modifies the settings of a custom throttling policy.

ModifyVpcAccessAndUpdateApis.title: ModifyVpcAccessAndUpdateApis
ModifyVpcAccessAndUpdateApis.summary: Modifies a virtual private cloud (VPC) authorization and updates the metadata of the API associated with the VPC authorization.

QueryRequestLogs.title: QueryRequestLogs
QueryRequestLogs.summary: Queries the request logs of a user.

ReactivateDomain.title: ReactivateDomain
ReactivateDomain.summary: Reactivates a custom domain name whose validity status is Abnormal.

RemoveAccessControlListEntry.title: RemoveAccessControlListEntry
RemoveAccessControlListEntry.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control for dedicated instances. Deletes an IP address entry from an access control policy.

RemoveApisAuthorities.title: RemoveApisAuthorities
RemoveApisAuthorities.summary: Revokes the access permissions on multiple APIs from a specified application.

RemoveAppsAuthorities.title: RemoveAppsAuthorities
RemoveAppsAuthorities.summary: Revokes the access permissions on a specified API from multiple applications. In this case, multiple applications map to a single API.

RemoveIpControlApis.title: RemoveIpControlApis
RemoveIpControlApis.summary: Unbinds an API from an access control list (ACL).

RemoveIpControlPolicyItem.title: RemoveIpControlPolicyItem
RemoveIpControlPolicyItem.summary: Removes one or more policies from an access control list (ACL).

RemoveSignatureApis.title: RemoveSignatureApis
RemoveSignatureApis.summary: Unbinds a backend signature key from APIs.

RemoveTrafficControlApis.title: RemoveTrafficControlApis
RemoveTrafficControlApis.summary: Unbinds a specified throttling policy from APIs.

RemoveVpcAccess.title: RemoveVpcAccess
RemoveVpcAccess.summary: Deletes a VPC access authorization without unpublishing associated APIs.

RemoveVpcAccessAndAbolishApis.title: RemoveVpcAccessAndAbolishApis
RemoveVpcAccessAndAbolishApis.summary: Deletes a VPC access authorization and unpublishes associated API.

ResetAppCode.title: ResetAppCode
ResetAppCode.summary: Resets the AppCode of an app.

ResetAppSecret.title: ResetAppSecret
ResetAppSecret.summary: Resets the key of an application.

SetAccessControlListAttribute.title: SetAccessControlListAttribute
SetAccessControlListAttribute.summary: This feature provides instance-level access control for dedicated instances. Modifies the name of an access control policy.

SetApisAuthorities.title: SetApisAuthorities
SetApisAuthorities.summary: Authorizes a specified application to call multiple APIs.

SetAppsAuthorities.title: SetAppsAuthorities
SetAppsAuthorities.summary: Grants access permissions on a specified API to multiple applications.

SetDomain.title: SetDomain
SetDomain.summary: Binds a custom domain name to a specified API group.

SetDomainCertificate.title: SetDomainCertificate
SetDomainCertificate.summary: Uploads an SSL certificate for a custom domain name.

SetDomainWebSocketStatus.title: SetDomainWebSocketStatus
SetDomainWebSocketStatus.summary: Enables or disables WebSocket for a custom domain name.

SetIpControlApis.title: SetIpControlApis
SetIpControlApis.summary: Creates a binding relationship between specified access control lists (ACLs) and APIs.

SetSignatureApis.title: SetSignatureApis
SetSignatureApis.summary: Binds a signature key to APIs.

SetTrafficControlApis.title: SetTrafficControlApis
SetTrafficControlApis.summary: Binds a throttling policy to APIs.

SetVpcAccess.title: SetVpcAccess
SetVpcAccess.summary: Creates a virtual private cloud (VPC) access authorization and enables reverse access.

SetWildcardDomainPatterns.title: SetWildcardDomainPatterns
SetWildcardDomainPatterns.summary: Specifies a wildcard domain name template for a bound custom domain name.

SwitchApi.title: SwitchApi
SwitchApi.summary: Switches the definition of an API in a specified runtime environment to a historical version.

ValidateVpcConnectivity.title: ValidateVpcConnectivity
ValidateVpcConnectivity.summary: Tests the network connectivity between an API Gateway instance and a port on an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) or Server Load Balance (SLB) instance in a virtual private cloud (VPC) access authorization.
